Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine

Interface UpdateExposer

public interface UpdateExposer
The interface UpdateExposer can be applied to any dynamic YaegerEntity or YaegerScene. By default, both of those hide their Updatable.update(long) method.

When implementing UpdateExposer, the Updatable.update(long) becomes exposed.

Note that this should not be used for timing events. In such cases a Timer should be used.

The exposedUpdate() will be called after the internal Updatable.update(long) has been called.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void explicitUpdate​(long timestamp)
    An explicit update that can be used from either a YaegerEntity or a YaegerScene.
    default Updatable exposedUpdate()  

  • Method Details

    • exposedUpdate

      default Updatable exposedUpdate()

    • explicitUpdate

      void explicitUpdate​(long timestamp)
      An explicit update that can be used from either a YaegerEntity or a YaegerScene.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The timestamp of this update.
